title: "Slugging it out: Scientists find material that mimics the intelligence of sea slug"
excerpt: "A team led by Purdue University used the Advanced Photon Source to characterize a quantum material that mimics the neural behavior of sea slugs. This could be a first step toward more efficient artificial intelligence hardware."
